## Configuration 

1) `git clone git@github.com:bassemgithub/nssRallysation.git`

2) `cd nssRallysation`

3) `composer install`

    Set Folder Permissions ? (Default to Y) [Y,n]? `y`

4) create a db nssreallyzation and table images (use the command inside nssReallyzation.sql)

5) inside the /bin folder run  `cake bake model images`

6) inside the /bin folder run  `cake server`

## Api use 

1) list images: (see screenshot/get.png ) 

   method: `GET http://localhost:8765/images`

2) add image (see screenshot/add.png ) 

    method :  `POST http://localhost:8765/images/add/`

    example of data to pass:
    {
    "name" : "Cristiano",
    "data" : "data:image/jpeg;base64,"
}

3) Edit image (see screenshot/edit.png)

    method : `PUT http://localhost:8765/images/edit/1`

    data: {
    "name" : "changeCristiano",
    "data" : "data:image/jpeg;base64,............
    }

4) `Delete image (see screenshot/delete.png)`

    method : DELETE http://localhost:8765/images/delete/1
